item.title: “Is Any Thing Too Hard for the Lord?”
item.description:
“Is Any Thing Too Hard for the Lord?” by undefined Douglas W. DeHaan, President, Portland Oregon East Stake given in Session 6 of 150th Semiannual General Conference on Tue Sep 30 1980
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: undefined Douglas W. DeHaan, President, Portland Oregon East Stake
